title: I need 10 rp for dreadnova gangplank, please help
body: i just bought rp thinking i would have enough rp to get dreadnova gangplank ( i know im stupid lol) if support could gift me 10 rp i would be so thankful

replies.body: Ayyyyy no question is a stupid question, expect the ones you never ask!!! I can absolutely make this happen for you, I just need a quick sketch of your favorite champ really quick to seal the deal ^_^
